meanings.definition: To cause to feel horror or shock.
meanings.sent2: The haunted house always horrifies visitors.
meanings.sent3: The idea of eating bugs horrifies my little sister.
meanings.sent4: The dark forest at night horrifies even the bravest souls.
meanings.sent5: The sudden scream from the attic horrifies the entire neighborhood.

meanings.definition: To fill with fear or dread.
meanings.sent1: The thought of failing the test horrifies him.
meanings.sent2: The storm clouds looming in the sky horrify the children.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a clown party horrifies my cat.
meanings.sent4: The empty streets at night horrify her more than anything.
meanings.sent5: The ghost stories around the campfire horrify the campers.
